Posts.Content: Ii'd like to know what kind of autoimmune diseases too! I've been in arimidex for the last 10 months.  I finished chemo on May 25th, 2011 and my hair hasn't come in yet?  I am beside myself.  Has anyone heard of this?  Please help.
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with pre-stage one invasive ductal breast cancer. Had double mastectomy and had herz 2 positive. Adriamycin and cytoxen followed by taxol and herceptin.  Finished taxol May 25, 2010.  Hair started to come in.  July I had breast implant surgery and hair fell out.  Finished herceptin on January 25, 2012 and still no hair.  Has anyone experienced this?  Please help...I'm beside myself.
Posts.Title: My hair hasn't grown and it's been almost one year since I finished chemo???
